item.title: Pros pls [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

You don’t need to be a pro to make this.

Make an array with all the NPCIDs you dont want people to be able to talk too.

like this

and in your first click npc packet add something like this:

for(int i : CantTalk) { if(NPCID == i) { sM("The Npc doesn't want to talk to you."); } }

Read full topic

item.title: Pros pls [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Angel_Carlos Angel Carlos
item.description:
@Angel_Carlos wrote:

Pros pls!

Revision: 317 loading 317.

problem: I want to when you click on a npc that does not have a dialogue, (like 2006scape) it sents a message “this npc is not interested with talking to you.”

if (npc.getPlayerOwner() != null && (npc.getPlayerOwner() != player || npc.getCombatingEntity() != null)) {
client.getDialoguesSM(“This npc is not interested in talking with you right now.”);
return;
}

how do I convert the first row of if( to a PI???

Read full topic
